name: Race: Rocket Arena Car Extreme
description: Race cars, fire rockets and win the league. 3D car racing action battlefield

name: Rocksuki: The Rescue of Ember!
description: A fan game made for the live streamer Selen Tatsuki of Nijisanji EN.

name: Devious Lick
description:
A game where you have to sneak into a school at night to get your target. Your mission is to sneak into the school at night and get your target.

Be on high alert! Aim carefully and boldly at your target! Move fast and sometimes you need to hide in plain sight. Press and hold to advance, and release to hide in the cardboard. Go through the blind spots to get closer to the target.

Once you get the target, get as many likes on social media as you can!

name: Minecraft: Caves & Cliffs - Part II
description: Minecraft: Caves & Cliffs - Part II is the second and final part of two major themed updates for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition, focused on overhauling overworld generation, including new caves and mountains.

name: Minecraft: Caves & Cliffs - Part II
description: Minecraft: Caves & Cliffs - Part II is the second and final part of two major themed updates for Minecraft: Java Edition, focused on overhauling overworld generation, including new caves and mountains.

name: Par 1 Golf 8
description: 18 holes, 18 lives, its you against the 2d golf course in Par One Golf 8! To line up your shot, touch the golf ball and drag back then release to shoot. Learn the tricks and beat the golf course. The eighth installment of Par One Golf will challenge you and frustrate you just like real GOLF!

name: Boxnigma
description: Move the boxes from each level correctly and simultaneously to move to the next challenge in this minimalist and retro 2D puzzle game!

name: Ghoul Castle 3D: Gold Edition
description: This is a simple old school dungeon crawler. It's made completely by one person - me, who is a fan of dark fantasy games, adventures, dungeons and dragons! Gold Edition means the game is complete with all additional features and items. It also offers new in-game economy based on the gold you collect

name: Heroes of Rome: Dangerous Roads
description: To win Cleopatra's heart, Caesar and his bravest Roman heroes have set out on a dangerous path. His goal is to find the Rose of Amor, which blooms on the Mountain of the Gods!

name: Dead by Daylight: Portrait of a Murder Chapter
description: The latest chapter for Dead by Daylight includes a new Killer – The Artist – and a new Survivor, Jonah Vasquez. A new Realm, the surreal Forsaken Boneyard, will be opened for all players. Purchasing this add-on also unlocks an exclusive cosmetic for Jonah: The Crimson Shirt.

name: The Wanderer
description: The Wanderer is an immersive, narrative-driven game with a focus on atmosphere. You play as a little robot, wandering through the end of the world. Will you too fade into memory? Only you can uncover secrets long kept hidden and take control of fate. Enjoy The Wanderer!

name: Something
description: A heroic story about the unforgettable journey of the cat Darchi, trying to find his life in the underworld with different physical properties.

name: Haunted House Escape
description: Enter, if you dare...Haunted House Escape - A VR Experience: A chilling mini escape adventure leading through an abandoned house. Highly realistic, immersive graphics and sounds. Be aware, you might not be the only one there.

name: Cryptosnake
description: Cryptosnake is an open-source decentralized play-to-earn game based on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) blockchain and at the same time, it is a decentralized autonomous organization created in 2021. Management rights are distributed among holders of SNK tokens. Holders manage the Cryptosnake game and SNK's financial risk, ensuring stability, transparency and efficiency. For this, the management system providing polls and administrative voting will be built in 2022. The number of votes is proportional to the number of SNK tokens that the participant sent to the address of the voting contract. In other words, the more SNK tokens a voting participant contributes, the more he influences the final decision.

name: Attack of Undo Zai
description: High definition furry anime characters in a non-stop action shooter with team.

name: Primafloows
description: Ping pong in unoriginal Punk style

name: Heroes of Egypt: The Curse of Sethos
description: Safely locked away in a temple complex for ages, sinister powers are unleashed, causing chaos and a momentous curse. Your path will take you and your cuddly Egyptians through different landscapes. Defeat countless creatures and lose no time to lift the curse!

name: Mushroom Hunter
description: Mushroom hunter - In this platformer you are a rather unusual cat who was sent to collect fly agarics by his mistress-witch. Don't let her down, or she might turn you into a toad! Unfortunately, the dogs found out about your plans and will interfere with you in every possible way ..

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: PKP/PREG Bdhpumn/B(16)mnopux Pack
description: Used for regional passenger trains in Poland, Romania, Czech Republic, and Germany this pack of 12 classic passenger coaches feature photorealistic fully PBR textures, and many different options.

name: Magneta Box
description: Magneta-box is a minimalistic box-pushing puzzle game about using magnets to interact with boxes that have a limited amount of player interactions.

name: Typing Land
description: A fun and exciting typing game. Learn how to type through 40 kinds of mini-games! We have developed this app as a safe platform for children and adults around the world to use.

name: Casino Tycoon Simulator
description: Upgrade your casino and become millionaire! Manage your Slots, BlackJacks, Roullettes, and many more. Protect your casino against thieves and cheaters.Want more? jump into mining market or build your dream nightclub!

name: Arrows
description: Arrows is a puzzle game with a minimalist and modern visual that consists of aligning the colored blocks

name: Floor is Lava
description: My Floor is Lava is an action platformer with puzzle elements in which you have to help a little inhabitant of a deep cave, which is being swallowed by lava

name: Evil Genius 2: World Domination - Deluxe Edition
description: Enhance your Evil Empire with the Deluxe Edition of Evil Genius 2! This version includes the Season Pass.

name: Hotel Hermes
description:
Play as one of the mailroom operators at the Hotel Hermes, a prestigious hotel in the swanky part of New Olympus. Your job is to ensure mail arrives at the right place at the right time and to accomplish this you have to master the archaic and eccentric system used by the hotel. In order to ensure mail reaches the right place, you will have to learn about the guests of the hotel, the upper management, fellow mail clerks, as well as the world at large.
As you play the letters you send will change the world around you. Hopefully for the best!

name: Doomsday Dreamgirl
description: Doomsday Dreamgirl is a kinetic visual novel. You're left staring at a stranger whom you've invited into the safety of your home for the final countdown. Is the end of the world even worth crying about? Surely not? But her tears keep telling you otherwise.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 3: Happy Chaos
description: This allows the character "Happy Chaos" to be used in-game.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam U.C. Engage
description:
Mobile Suit Gundam U.C. ENGAGE is a Universal Century War simulation game that brings together Gundam's Universal Century works.
You can enjoy a digest with animation of Universal Century works developed in past TV anime, movie, OVA, etc., and a new story of Universal Century that combines animation and battle / adventure.
In the simulation battle, you can perform powerful 6vs6 battle with realistic 3D mobile suits with simple operation / auto play, and you can feel the battlefield of the Universal Century.
Experience the history of the battle of the Universal Century with Mobile Suit Gundam U.C. ENGAGE, a Gundam mobile game that expands and deepens the Universal Century!

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 15
description: Season 15 comes to you with a map service update, a new vehicle (the mountain bike). balance and world updates, as well as some Christmas themed fun!

name: Void Dementia
description: Void -Dementia- is a rogue-like action game that takes place in a void zone. The game features stylish fast action and hardcore production and difficulty. It is an action game that will amplify the user's sense of challenge and immersion in the game with the story and roguelike elements of the voice area.

name: // Overdrive
Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout - Season 6
description: Party on! Dive into a carnival of crowns, with an all-new festival-fresh Blunderdome headlined by new rounds, obstacles and bean celebrations galore...

name: Global City
description: Become the mayor and build the city of your dreams! In this game, anything is possible. Whatever you can imagine in a city-building and development simulator, you can do. Start from the very beginning and unlock new possibilities for developing your city in Global City!

name: Tank De La Muerta
description: Tank de la Muerta follows Enrique, a normal zombie, humbly living in the cemetery, determined to find the love of his life. Throughout his wanderings, and innumerous parties, Enrique will have to make choices, that will impact the very foundation of the relationship with his friends, or may lead to nothing at all. Will he be able to find love?

name: Oddworld: Soulstorm - Enhanced Edition
description: Witness Abe's horrifying conflict with a terrifying new machination. A fresh narrative - a complete story retake inspired by our original tale. A big visual and cinematic leap aiming to break new ground for Oddworld. Intelligent new mechanics, twisted new devices enabling highly explosive deviousness. A dark parable that tells an epic tale of a volatile society pushed to its limits. This new version of Oddworld: Soulstorm includes all previously released updates and gameplay enhancements made to the base game with even more changes and fixes to come.

name: MXGP 2021
description: All the power of Motocross in your hands: the new MXGP 2021 is finally here! The official MXGP video game is ready to show you what it's made of: warm up your engines and get ready for the most realistic, exciting two-wheeled experience ever!

name: Wednesday Basketball
description: Live a year in a small town basketball association. Follow the stories of Fanny, Alex, Remy, Ajiba, Laura, Odile, Benjamin, Amir, Kariem and Meng as the season passes by. Some will join, some will leave. Relax and play some basketball.

name: Gear.Club Unlimited 2: Ultimate Edition
description: Drive legendary vehicles in a huge environment with rich & diverse landscapes with remastered graphics for an enhanced experience! Manage your garage and make it your space! Admire your collection of racing cars acquired along your races. Gear Club Unlimited 2 offers more than 50 licensed vehicles from some of the world’s most prestigious manufacturers.

name: Gear.Club Unlimited 2: Definitive Edition
description: Drive legendary vehicles in a huge environment with rich & diverse landscapes with remastered graphics for an enhanced experience! Manage your garage and make it your space! Admire your collection of racing cars acquired along your races. Gear Club Unlimited 2 offers more than 50 licensed vehicles from some of the world’s most prestigious manufacturers.

name: Alwa's Collection
description: Alwa's Collection includes Alwa's Legacy and Alwa's Awakening for the Nintendo Switch on one physical cartridge.

name: Beyond a Steel Sky: Beyond a Steel Book Edition
description:
Beyond A Steel Sky: Beyond A SteelBook Edition Includes: Base Game, Limited Edition SteelBook featuring comic artwork by Dave Gibbons, Sticker Sheet, Digital Original Soundtrack

The World: An adventure set within a dynamic world, populated by willful characters and driven by motivations that the player can subvert; In combination with a unique hacking tool, multiple solutions to puzzles emerge from the player's choices

The Story: Unravel dark conspiracies and defeat a terrifying antagonist in this dramatic, humorous, cyberpunk thriller which explores contemporary themes, such as: social control, AI, and total surveillance

The Puzzles: Intelligent puzzles are interwoven with an intriguing dramatic narrative to deliver a compelling gameplay experience.

The Look: A beautifully detailed, comic-book styled world from the mind of legendary comic artist Dave Gibbons (Watchmen)

name: Beyond A Steel Sky: Utopia Edition
description:
The Utopia Edition includes:
- Game: Beyond a Steel Sky
- Steel book
- Stickers
- Original Digital Soundtrack
- Exclusive Hologram Lamp
- 50 Page Mini Artbook
- Enamel Pin
- Exchangeable Dog Tags (Keychain & Necklace)
- 5 Holo-ad-Cards
- 2 XXL Premium Stickers
- Unique Collector's Box

name: Afterthought
description: Learn to finish and speedrun the levels with ease, while experimenting with different playstyles and abilities. Explore the movement system of Afterthought to navigate your way through a visually stunning world with a diverse soundtrack.

name: Bloons TD Battles 2
description:
Battle through a series of challenging Arenas and prove that you have what it takes to enter the fabled Hall of Masters and seize your glory!

From the creators of Bloons TD 6 comes a brand new installment of the top-rated head-to-head tower defense game. Gather your Hero, choose your team of powerful Monkey Towers, and prepare to battle one on one against other players and relentless waves of Bloons!

name: ThrustLander
description: ThrustLander is an action cave-flyer with modern graphics, classic gameplay, challenging levels and modern visuals. Battle through over 250 levels and 3 game modes including a retro mode!

name: Marvel's Avengers: Spider-Man - With Great Power
description: Spider-Man - With Great Power is a PlayStation exclusive Hero Event that introduces a new playable character, Spider-Man, complete with his own gear and cosmetics. Players will experience Spider-Man’s story through unlockable challenges woven throughout the Avengers Initiative.

name: Raptor Territory
description:
RULE THE MAP
Slip into the Role of a Deinonychus, join and Support your Team and Capture the Map, find and kill your enemies before they do.
Work with together with your Team, improve your Strategy. A third person controlled dinosaur, real time fights and your team is waiting for you!

DIFFERENT MAPS
You can play on 3 different Maps, and more will be added!
Up to 11 Teams can play on one map at the same time!

COSTUMIZATION
Choose the appearance of your Deinonychus!

DIFFERENT GAME MODES
There are different Game Modes, variety is guaranteed.
The Game Modes are:

- Capture the map:
Your team have to capture a defined percentage of the map, the team that reach that goal first wins!

- Capture against Time
The team that captured the biggest part of the map in a given time wins.

- Solo Modifier
Instead of building Teams it's everyone against everyone!

- Free Roam
There isnt actual an goal, you and your friends can do what you want.

name: Clockwork Aquario
description:
Clockwork Aquario was the last arcade game ever developed by the legendary Westone Bit Entertainment in 1992, but was never finished. The game was thought to be lost in time, but Strictly Limited Games set out on the mission to dig deep into video game archeology and save Clockwork Aquario from being lost in time.

Beautiful pixel art and vibrant colors with three unique characters: Huck Londo, the daring ghost hunter, Elle Moon, the brave adventuress and Gush, the warmhearted giant robot.

name: Joan of Arc: The Beginning
description: Psychedelic dreams, burning Magic gates, petrified boy, floating castles… The Player will act as Joan of Arc explore the village with the simple screen click to analyse the information, and solve the mystery behind the truth. The process is also the process of Joan’s self-growth.

name: Fight Knight
description: Fight Knight is a mix between a first person dungeon crawler and a high speed action game. Players spend their time ascending a massive Tower, learning the story of Fight Knight and getting to know friend & foe alike. Along the way they'll solve puzzles, collect artifacts and help Fight Knight grow in power. Encounters take place in real time, through grid based melee combat. Wits and reflexes pave the way to victory. Will you master the Tower and those who wait within?

name: Exedra Chao: Combat
description: A 2D Chao fighting game featuring the Chao of the Xicon Exedra universe. The game is a 1-on-1 fighting game with Arcade Mode, VS Mode, and Team Battle Mode. The characters indeed are Chao that can be seen in the Sonic series, but these Chao specifically are in the Exedra Chao world located in the Xicon Exedra universe - even if many look exactly like the ones from Sonic. This game is free-to-play and is practically a fan game of the Chao from Sonic, but are the OC Chao of XiconExertoroyah.

name: Remute: Electronic Deathstyle
description: Electronic Deathstyle is a well-balanced collection of 16 brand new songs and remixes for the PC Engine CD/TurboGrafx CD that makes this the perfect companion to this year's previously released PC-Engine/TG-16 and Game Boy albums 'Electronic Lifestyle' and 'Living Electronics'.

name: Prodigal
description:
After two years abroad, the prodigal childe of Tremere Elder Benedict finally returns.... but all is not well. Was this familiar mansion always so rotten? Was your daytime sleep always this troubled? Did these usual smiles always hide something? And why can't you remember anything about this 'trip' you're supposed to have gone on?

The truth waits beyond your nightmares.

Welcome home, Kolya.

This game was created as a part of the Dark Pack Vampire: The Masquerade game jam and released under the World of Darkness Unbound license. Events portrayed in this game are not canon within the World of Darkness.

This is just a funny little story to frighten fledglings.

name: TrailBouncer
description:
TrailBouncer is a fast-paced VR racing game where breathtaking locomotion meets ultra-fast ball handling in a stunning and surreal environment. A steep learning curve pushes players to master the challenging environments with rapid interactions that constantly challenge their skills and reflexes.

Race at lightning speed through different zones in a mythical environment. Race and spin up and down the mountains while going over boost pads to be even faster.

Strive to unlock all levels and stay at the top of the game by using power-ups to your advantage and achieve the highest rank among your fellow players.

name: Street Fighter V: Luke
description: This DLC adds Luke as a fighter.

name: Defina
description: Defina Finance is a fascinating blockchain game that combines the concept of DeFi and NFT. Players are able to buy or collect various NFT Mystery Boxes to get champions/weapons as well as fight and enhance their champions to learn skills in numerous game scenarios. Players can participate in DeFi yield farming and earn abundant on-chain earnings while enjoying a fun and strategic card game with PVP and PVE modes. Defina’s vision is to bring blockchain to millions of players, allowing them to explore a new form of gaming through blockchain technology.

name: HeavenSlinger
description:
Hailing from Fifth of Hells, a devilish gunslinger seeks vengeance on angelkind for destroying her home.

Heavenslinger is a fast paced shooter where you ambush your enemies, and follow up with devastating combos with 5 guns to switch between.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening Redux
description: Link's Awakening Redux is a hack that commemorates the release of the Link’s Awakening Remake, combining three of the most essential improvement hacks out there, and also implementing full uncensorship for Link’s Awakening DX to make the experience of the game much more enjoyable and without the annoyances of the original.

name: John Doe
description: A surreal visual novel/dating sim style atmospheric game about going to work and meeting someone.

name: Moriya Rhythm Rainbow
description:
This is a game based on a derivative work of Touhou Project.
Control Moriya, who keeps bouncing to the BGM, to defeat the boss.
This work was originally created for Touhou Game Jam 2021, and was adjusted and released after the event.

name: Genshin Funkin'
description: Travel around the world of Teyvat as Hu-Tao, as you challenge others in a sing off. With 3 full weeks featuring fan songs and covers sung by some of the original Genshin voice actors! This was made as a tribute to the incredible talents of the Genshin voice actors. Includes easy and normal difficulties respectively, along with swapped charts to play the opponent’s side!

name: Brutal Doom: Platinum
description: Brutal Doom Platinum is a fork of Brutal Doom designed to keep the original mod's vision, while adding polish, features, and variety. Previously known as 'Dox's Personalized Brutal Doom', this mod is in active development

name: Pocket Zone
description:
co-op survival classic RPG in the world stalkers of the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone

New co-op survival game from the developers of Pocket Survivor, Pocket Survivor 2, Pocket Survivor: Expansion has reached an unprecedented level of nuclear addicting mix in the direction of text quest and RPG, event visualization and hundreds of different character animations!

A Unique mix of unusual gameplay from the symbiosis of the best survival setting of the stalkers of the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone and the Role-playing System, a classic RPG in the spirit of the world of Fallout and the Wasteland!

Artifacts and mutants, adventurers and bandits, endless generated events in the game with a well-thought-out role-playing system of classes and skills, as well as an indescribable atmosphere of loner survival in the brutal world of the Zone!

name: Coffee Inc 2
description:
Welcome to The Coffee Inc 2: the next generation of The Coffee Inc, a popular business simulation game in the world.
As a founder and CEO, your role is to start up your coffee shop, manage coffee bean blends, create the best coffee products, hire and motivate the best talents, conduct effective marketing, manage financials, expand the business to multiple cities and build the biggest coffee empire!

name: Sinisistar: Lite Version
description: A simple 2D action game centered on themes of masochistic tendencies, yearning for death, as well as despair at being attacked by terrifying beings.

name: Village the Siberia
description: Uncover the terrible secret of Siberia as a little boy in the first person.

name: Meister2
description: Craft and upgrade your gear to give your units a role. Units can continue to switch roles, depending on their equipment: Tanker, DPS, Healer, Worker, etc. Craft the most appropriate equipment to counteract the monsters who have gone crazy due to the unstable mana stream from destroying the village.

name: Tiny Gods of the Nile
description: Welcome to Egypt ! With your friends, play as gods in training and complete magical recipes for your classes ! Have fun : cheat, cast spells… But be careful, Râ your teacher will gladly scold you if you get caught !

name: The Labyrinth of Greed
description: Having collected all the treasures, you will gain power that the gods themselves did not dream of. Classic gameplay in which you have to collect items and avoid dangers.

name: They Look Like People
description: A Psychological story game set within a Kubrickian world. A tale of Space & Adventure into the Abyss of your mind, two astronauts come into close encounters with an unknown object during a routine mission.

name: OplitisAV
description: You are a Ferocious Anti-virus Systemic Trucidator (FAST), you are injected in an infected system, and your sole objective is to eradicate all virus life forms.

name: Snake Pit
description: "Snake Pit" is a Puzzle Game with a simple but incredibly Fun Gameplay. Help the little Caveman escape the Snakes and defeat Medusa.

name: Nuclear Corps
description: Sin descripción

name: 9-Ball Pocket
description: 9-Ball Pocket brings you eight-ball pool, also known as American billiards.All of this comes in a setting with great graphics and Jazz music.

name: Striving for Light
description: Striving for Light is a rogue-lite ARPG where you utilise a unique infinite expanding skilltree to fight your way through the darkness, striving for light.

name: ScooterFlow
description: Ride like a pro in this super realistic physics-based scooter game! Boost halfpipes, grind the street sections or hit the mega ramp for massive airs. This game has something for everyone, whatever your style.

name: DrumBeats VR
description: DrumBeatsVR is a VR drumming music game. Players can drum to our songs that are custom made for this game. In DrumBeatsVR you can practice on different drum kits, including Metallica and The Rolling Stones and you can play in three different environments (more to be added later).

name: QuestNotes
description: QuestNotes is an MMOTRPG (Massively Multiplayer Online Table Talk RPG). As a player, you can not only explore the fantasy world of swords and sorcery. As a master, you can become a storyteller and create scenarios and sessions. Up to four players can form a party and adventure together.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Blood Frontier
description: So, you want to ride with Padre and the Autarkis Gangrel of the Lost Souls coterie? You think you have what it takes to sleep rough over 1,200 miles of southern-Texas border with the Mexican Jaguar himself? To pistol-whip Sabbat incursions? To wrangle the cattle ranches and border crossings of the Circulatory System? To lasso drug mules carting vitae-laced meth? Big cojones, huh? Alright, saddle up. The border tribes can always use another quickdraw, if you pan out that is. Welcome to the Blood Frontier.

name: Botaniki
description: A 3D Yume Nikki fangame. Explore Ouiki's dreams, and uncover the dark world she lives in, and has created for herself.

name: Froggy Quest
description:
The original Froggy Quest made for the Lost Cartridge Jam 2021.
Help Froggy on his quest to eat as many flies as possible! Use your sticky tongue to move crates and solve challenging platformer puzzles.

name: Astro Cat
description: Oh no! Aliens have set up a base on the moon in order to invade Earth - and only Astro Cat can destroy it! Shoot through alien enemies and destroy that base!

name: PowerPutt Legend
description: PowerPutt Legend is a unique minigolf game with RPG elements, meant to look and feel like it's straight out of the NES. Slay monsters, level up, and unlock a series of items to improve your strategy.

name: Fractured Worlds
description: Fractured Worlds is a collection of 8 blue/cyan Boom compatible (cl9) maps, spanning a wide variety of themes and presenting some challenging set piece encounters and incidental combat. There are some large and small maps, and each one contains a secret fight, accessible by finding the hidden purple keycard in each level. There are 6 maps by me (7 including the anti-Underhalls map at the end) and 2 secrets maps by Scotty and Insane Gazebo, taking the map 31 and 32 slots respectively. Maps jump from tech gardens and deep caverns to grand neo-gothic architecture and abstract void spaces.

name: Avoid Them: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - Challenge Mode Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Runick
description: Runick is a 3D isometric simple, yet challenging puzzle game. The idea is to use rune infused shapes to adequately mark all the tiles on a given board. The shapes the player interacts with adhere to certain geometric principles.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Canary Islands
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Arm Wrestling Reborn
description: The ultimate arcade button smasher. Experience the life as a professional arm wrestler. Play on desktop PC or in VR. Single player campaign or 2-player VS.

name: Tied by your Red
description: A story of the sold girl Erica is about to live with the Duke who has a very bad reputation in this terrifying mansion. She has to live where she will die if she says something wrong in accident? ! A Lily story, stereotype but sweet story of Beauty and the Beast will be staged soon.

name: Memory Grove
description: A mood journal come to life. Record your thoughts and feelings each day and watch as the library of your memories grows more popular and your garden grows more verdant.

name: Warzone-X
description: Warzone-X is developed in a distant future 2755 where the big corporations have poisoned the planet and these are fighting for the few remaining resources.

name: Breadbox
description: Breadbox is a fascinating retro computer simulator that allows you to step back in time and experience the magic of machines from the 70s and 80s. In this visual environment, you can interact with hardware and old media as if they were real.

name: Cat Nightmares: The Key
description: Sin descripción

name: Beneath our Scars
description:
This game takes place in a private clinic and depicts the blooming love story between Melinda and Rowan.

Your choices matter and will allow you to build and help their relationship evolve. Make the best decisions to unlock illustrations during the story!

name: Fantasy Memory: Sexy Mermaids
description: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing sexy mermaids hidden under viking symbols which you have to match.

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Cut-Throat Coast
description: A nautical-themed Banjo-Kazooie ROM hack that takes place in a gloomy seaside town.

name: Tales From The Outer Zone: The Construction
description:
A gunslinging tale of settlers and zygnoka.

While finalizing the construction of the futuristic metropolis The Structure, the young Constructor journeys out into The Outer Zone to mine for zygnoka at a nearby meteorite impact crater.

name: Ossuarium
description: In medieval Bohemia, Marie and Jakub struggle to escape a terrible curse - but their futures have already been written.

name: Hoofield
description: Powerhoof just released their latest masterpiece, and now Dave wants to celebrate by taking a day off to relax! Alas, life isn't always that simple, especially in Hoofield...

name: Perilous Wilde
description: Perilous Wilde follows the valiant Amelya Conner and her forest band of exiles as they plot a town's rescue against villainous invaders.

name: Friday Night Funkin': VS. Cassette Girl
description: Friday Night Funkin': VS. Cassette Girl is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' based on the Cassette Girl character, an upcoming character for Friday Night Funkin'. The mod puts the development teams original take onto the upcoming character, featuring a full week of content and an additional 2 extra bonus songs.

name: A Hat in Time: Vanessa's Curse
description: A deadly game of tag in Queen Vanessa's Manor! Escape the clutches of your fallen peers.

name: Huntress: The Cursed Village
description: Returning to her village from a hike, the Huntress finds it under a curse! Join the Huntress and battle exciting Match-3 challenges to overwhelm the curse and save the village.

name: Scroll of Life
description: Scroll of Life is a 2D adventure platformer, discover an interesting world full of traps and monsters!

name: The Mirror Between Us
description: Guide this couple through the puzzles - Love may not have forsaken them yet...

name: TraxWorld
description: Open-world third-person game crossed with an off-road vehicle sim. Exit the vehicle in 3rd person, use character tools, collect items to sell from the pouch or collect your machines in the vehicle inventory. Mods, damage and dirtiness is progressive and lasting. Multiple stage releases.

name: Farmquest
description: Everything on Joe's farm is in chaos. Everything urgently needs to be put back in order here. Help Joe find important objects and hidden treasures on his farm. Who doesn't love them? The small and detailed hidden object pictures that challenge children to find certain items. They have been proven to promote children's perception and language progression. Farmquest can be played by children of any age. Thanks to the voice output, even toddlers are able to explore the hidden object pictures on their own. They do not need to be able to read to have a sense of achievement. Concentration and attentiveness are taught in a playful way. Incidentally, a study conducted by the Singapore Technological University proved the fact that hidden object games increase the understanding of spatial perception in memory. In addition, visual search skills were noticeably improved. The game can also be used to support language learning. Simply select the desired language in the settings and start playing. What are you waiting for?

name: KubeBird
description: KubeBird is the new NFT game (side scrolling shooting type) from the creators of Plant VS Undead and it's designed to revolve around the combination between your skills and fun-to-play experience.

name: Fight N' Fall
description: Fight N' Fall is a top-down hero brawler where you can destroy the environment to make your enemies fall onto their demise. The game has several heroes to choose from and a wide array of colorful arenas to destroy!

name: Thetan Arena
description: Thetan Arena is an e-sport game based on Blockchain technology. You can gather your friends, form a team, battle with others and earn money with just your skills. Thetan Arena's gameplay is designed to revolve around the combination of your personal skills and teamwork. Challenge yourself with various game modes: MOBA & Battle Royale, coming with monthly updates and attractive rewards.

name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2: Chara Pack Special - Mystia Lorelei
description: Mystia Lorelei's expansion pack is a collaboration with our new game Touhou Mystia's Izakaya, you will be able to use Mystia Lorelei in game.

name: SNK Fighting Legends: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Minesweeper
description: Sin descripción

name: The Backstreets
description: The Backstreets is a doom-like FPS made by GRG Productions. You play as Kain Rodriguez, who must fight The Moths to stop them from cloning people. However, you might be a clone yourself. The Moths are a vicious terrorist organization who have taken over many towns and cities, but there are rumors that something much more is going on behind the scenes. Find out what they are doing by playing The Backstreets.

name: You're Mine!
description:
In this interactive romance otome game, you are the one in control of the romantic story!

You have several options on how the story will unfold.
Immerse yourself in an enchanted game of your choice.

name: Atlas Novum
description: Atlas Novum is an overhaul mod for Europa Universalis IV which alters many aspects of the game: a massive map overhaul adding in 1000s of new provinces; the addition of 1000+ countries, over 1000 new cultures and a dozen new religions, including a minority system and culture families; a rework of development into wealth, infrastructure and population; 100 new trade goods with dynamic prices determined on supply and demand; and much more.

name: Psychic Eclipse
description: A BL visual novel for PC.

name: Hentai Memory: Sexy Couples
description: Train your brain with this memory game, featuring kanji characters and reveal sexy hentai couples as you clear the board.

name: Friday Night Funkin': D Side
description: Sin descripción

name: The Collector
description: Multi story collection, experience many different nightmares, integrate physics, plot, battle and other rich content, and provide horror games with continuous content updates.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Praetorian Set Bundle
description: A warrior must learn and adapt to rise above all others. Purchase the Praetorian Set Bundle to receive Warlord-themed premium gear items and weapon skins.

name: Coloring Pixels: Advent 3 Pack
description: This Advent 3 themed book unlocks 24 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Each image celebrates the Holiday season! Play during the month of December to get the full Advent experience! 1 image will unlock every day between the 1st and the 24th like a true advent calendar!

name: Smart Moves Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: fragment:AM
description: fragment:AM is a psyche simulation RPG.

name: Road to Newtopia
description: Road to Newtopia is a fan made game based on the cartoon Amphibia and inspired by several classic games such as The Oregon Trail, Earthbound, Kirby, and others.

name: Donkey Kong 64: Tag Anywhere
description: A mod for Donkey Kong 64 which makes it possible to change characters anywhere, changing how the exploration and collectibles affect gameplay.

name: Sushi Break 2: Head to Head
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario's Grand Adventure
description: Welcome to the Fungus Islands! Bowser has given up trying to kidnap Princess Peach (for now), and his son, Bowser Jr, has set his sights on the Fungus Islands. Mario and Luigi, being on vacation there, naturally, have to stop Bowser Jr's plans. Can the brothers stop the Colonization of the Islands?

name: Ari In Wonderland: Episode 1
description: Ari after a long day falls fast asleep and goes back into wonderland. She has no idea why she is back. A lot has changed and the more she thinks about her past it gets more and more blurry. Ari meets some friends on the way to help her find what she wants and to restore wonderland, discover Ari's past along with her.

name: Super Sus
description: Join the next level of 3D Among Us game - Super Sus: Who is the Imposter! The best free mobile game to social with local friends and those from worldwide offers you an unique experience to be space crews, who struggles to prevent the spaceship from crashing while for imposters, killing crew mates is all they want.

name: Sumy Shelltris: Iceblocks 3
description: Tetris? Not! Mutant Tetris!

name: Overlord: Nobody Know Victory Better Than Me
description: No one knows victory better than me! I come, I see, I conquer! Idle casual war game, brand new gameplay, use swords and magic to conquer the unknown continent!

name: Albert and Camille's Little Lille Adventure
description: Explore a war-torn city, avoid capture by soldiers, and collect the supplies Albert and Camille need to create the first vaccine to fight tuberculosis. As you progress, you will learn about the methods used to create BCG and how vaccines work.

name: Star of the Show
description: An interactive game show has surfaced on the web and you're the STAR OF THE SHOW! Investigate and even compete in the show! Be prepared, this show is life and death. Star Of The Show is a home invasion psychological horror game.

name: Soccer Manager 2022
description: Sign official FIFPRO licensed players and compete to become the ultimate football manager!

name: Help Me Remember, Satori-sama!
description: Satori's overworked herself into bed, but Okuu needs help remembering things! You can't use her heart-reading power, and will instead have to ask questions and use her power of recollection to correct wrong info, all while enduring visits from Orin and Koishi as you deduce what Okuu's forgotten!

name: MageRun
description: Fight as a magician in this ever-growing project in fantastic worlds against monsters. Collect new spells, get stronger and defeat bosses. No story, just fun gameplay.

name: The Sunday Museum
description: This little "retro" experimental game lets you explore a small museum, called "The Sunday Museum". You can walk around and interact with either the signs or tv sets in each room.

name: Sousaku Kanojo no Renai Koushiki
description:
Our protagonist, Toshiki Kagami, is headed to Tokyo, where he will begin living with his cousin and her family. Unbeknownst to others, he harbors a desire within himself.

He wants to rekindle that creative spark he all but lost now.

name: Cubic Dweller
description: Cubic Dweller is a hard 2d platformer that is made to be fun and enjoyable but has tricky jumps and movement. There are boss fights and new mechanics that you will come across whenever you start a new world. Give this game a try and have fun!

name: Cute Honey: Bunny Girl
description: Cute Honey: Bunny Girl is a strategic tower defense game that, as the story progresses, player can use items from each scene to lower the strength of the succubier Elise to achieve the ultimate goal of preventing the succubier from entering human society.

name: Hot Roads
description: "Hot Roads" is an arcade motorcycle racing game. You are driving a fast motorcycle on an endless highway with heavy traffic.

name: ChaoticNightmare
description: "FerryGate" focuses on the experience of walking in horror scenes. Players will carry cameras to explore special places in areas blocked by the government, record videos, and avoid the supernatural creatures' kill

name: Fatal Paws
description: A visual novel with dark humor, turn based combat, and stat building. Experience the fatal strength in companionship and the emotional bond that can come from it.

name: Mistake
description: According to the assurances of scientists, the probability of an on-board computer error is only 0.0001%, but we should have pulled out this lucky ticket!

name: Astro Rangers
description: Astro Rangers is an intense, action-packed shooter where you need to do everything you can in order to win. You have an immersive, and satisfying gameplay experience where you must complete a variety of missions. Usually, you have to eliminate all your enemies as fast as you can in order to win. Since there are multiple weapons to choose from, every session is very different, and you can easily strategize and pick how to play. If you always wanted an intense, fun, and engaging shooter with lots of missions, try out Astro Rangers today!

name: Real Boxing 2
description: Discover a whole new world of combat sports games. As a newbie boxer, challenge experienced opponents and try to win and score a KO! Explore the world of boxing and make your way to the top. You can become the boxing champion, the best warrior of all time! Discover what you're made of, and try to climb to the top. Become the ultimate champion! Use jabs, hooks, uppercuts & combine them into devastating combos.

name: Crazy Trucks
description: Jump into this pure arcade gameplay and shake up the Monster Truck world by dominating your rivals in an extreme face-to-face confrontation!

name: Porcelain Tales
description: Porcelain Tales is a 3D platform, puzzle strategy game. Where you become a tiny garden gnome, brought to life by a generous witch in order to help her collect the things she desires most. Made of porcelain you have to be careful while exploring the world of the witch’s B&B. You have the ability to hide in narrow crannies and sneak around as quiet as a mouse. In addition, you can carry objects six times your size. During your adventure through the B&B, you will encounter many obstacles to overcome and various objects to collect. Your way home won’t be easy to find, as you wander through the maze of the B&B.

name: Implements of Hell
description: Implements of Hell is a first-person psychological horror game. Explore the mysteries, unlock the secrets, and change the outcome in a slow-paced atmospheric, and extremely horrifying experience.

name: Million on Mars: Land Rush
description: Million on Mars: Land Rush, is a 2D browser-based play-to-earn game that uses NFTs on the WAX blockchain. Players in Land Rush partner with DuskWorks co-founder Leon Dusk in a not-so-secret settlement just outside of the view of the Ad Astra Unlimited headquarters in Valles Marineris. Land Rush features similar elements of crafting and land development, but with a more simplified approach to realism and science, and a greater emphasis on creating a rich player-owned economy to support the game as it evolves. We see a future in which time spent playing games like Land Rush can not only be incredibly fun and engaging but also provide an economic opportunity for players who invest their time and resources skillfully.

name: Space Hoarders Inc.
description:
A Sci-Fi turn based resource management game.
Mine, craft and ship resources across the galaxy!

name: Heroes of Xanfurth
description: Travel across Xanfurth in a coming of age JRPG.

name: Senkou no Clarias
description: A Fantasy Mecha Action Game made by the same development team of the Baldr Series.

name: Andy's Apple Farm
description:
In this game, you play a copy of a fictional beta test version of the game "Andy's Apple Farm", a game that was supposed to be released in the mid-1980s. The game isn't actually a beta test, however, the game's version is designed to appear as one.

The game starts to "glitch" and reveal more of the story behind the game. This game has a lot of secrets to discover so it may require several playthroughs to have different experiences and fully understand the game's internal story.

name: The Giraffe World
description: Oh no! An evil person has scattered all of the Giraffe's hats, can you help the Giraffe collect them all?

name: Quizee
description: Quizee is a Trivia based party game that can be played locally with friends, or online with a Twitch community! If you're a streamer on Twitch, then get your community involved! Link the game with your Twitch chat, and your community can type their answers to the questions to compete to see who is the smartest in your community! If you want to play with your friends, hook up gamepads and play locally!

name: Jack and the Beanstalk Jigsaw Puzzle
description: If you like puzzles and a beautiful story, this is the right game for you, Jigsaw Puzzle Jack and the Beanstalk is a minimalist game with 5 difficulty levels (64, 144, 289, 484 and 784 pieces).

name: Neversong: Collector's Edition
description:
The Collector's Edition comes with:
- Game: Neversong
- Collector's Box
- Enamel Pin
- Original Soundtrack CD
- Set of 14 Character Cards
- Redwind Field Music Store Sheets
- Art Printed Poster

name: Crash the Core
description: A roguelike deck builder where you manage a spy agency gathering intel about the secret location of a planet's core system or uncover a conspiracy to take over the galaxy! With a unique battlefield system and a spy agency management metagame that makes your later runs more varied and strategic.

name: Date Night Bowling
description: Ten characters in search of love gather around two neon-lit bowling alleys for some date night bowling. Choose your character, find your date, and try your best to hit it off—or at least hit some pins.

name: Turkey Hero
description: Sin descripción

name: Love Affairs
description:
Your Choice can lead you to every Ending!
Romance, Drama, Mystery, Thriller and More!

Love Affairs, romantic interactive story game with your choices, is now ★open★!

Multiple story games within one, Love Affairs!

name: Mario Party 3 StarStruck
description:
The Mario Party 3 hacking scene has created lots of fantastic custom boards over the last few years, using Party Planner 64. In this compilation patch, 6 of the best custom boards have been bundled for your convenience.

Features

6 new Mario Party 3 boards to play!

Star Summit
Animal Crossing
Paradise Isles
Rainbow Boulevard
Towering Treetop
TRG Land

name: Doctor Who: The Edge of Reality - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All - Lizzy Musi Bundle
description: The Lizzy Musi Bundle for Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All features new vehicles and parts from Lizzy Musi’s garage. The DLC includes her all new car, 10 body kits, three sets of rims, and four new paint bundles. Expand your customization options for your favorite Street Outlaws racer!

name: Pokémon Luminescent Platinum
description:
Pokémon Luminescent Version is a mod for Pokémon Brilliant Diamond, inspired by the fantastic work of Drayano. Thousands of changes have been made to the base game, including (but by no means limited to) animation and texture changes, new forms for Pokémon coming from many other points of media such as Crystal Onix or Armored Mewtwo, the full Renegade Platinum main storyline (postgame upcoming), trade evolutions methods changed, more gift Pokémon throughout the storyline and so much more.

This is a mod made by the community, for the community, so anyone is free to join the Discord and apply to join the development team.

name: Doom Day
description: First person shooter. In the style of famous games like Doom, Quake, Duke Nukem and Call of Duty. You have to play as the only survivor after the crash of the pilot of a combat helicopter, fighting with a huge army of enemies. Improve your skills and upgrade your weapons. All in your hands.

name: Train Sim World 2: Sherman Hill: Cheyenne - Laramie Route
description: All the grandeur of big-time, modern American freight railroading – bustling and constant action, tough grades, powerful diesels, majestic western scenery, and extraordinary history – come together on Union Pacific's legendary Sherman Hill. And now, Sherman Hill comes to Train Sim World 2!

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 9
description: Set of photos of our fantastic planet! Discover the breathtaking beauty of our world alongside 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 9!

name: SGS: Heia Safari
description: The only campaign where forces of Imperial Germany fought victoriously till the end. From 1914 to 1918 in East Africa, you play general Von Lettow and his skilled Askaris or Allied troops from the Empire, Belgium and Portugal. Get the ‘African Queen’ feel when playing this exotic campaign.

name: Omega Chronos
description:
What happened to mankind? Why everything is silence? Who are you?

There is only silence. Even these artificial lights are dead. These walls, they are my prison?

name: Sniper Road
description: This game can test your sniper abilities. Enemy detection, distance calculation, and precise aiming skills are essential. Kill all the hidden enemy snipers and reach the destination!

name: Motorbike Traffic Splash
description: Motorbike Traffic Splash is an arcade scoring race.

name: Spin City
description: "Spin City" is a simulator of an elite casino full of secrets, where you can fully plunge in the world of excitement and try your luck, enjoying the elegant neon design. Make risky bets, feel free to spin the roulette wheel and win in real time!

name: My Cashy Side Job at Lost&Found in the Subway of Million-Person City
description: Noir adventure for an unlucky subway's lost and found worker!

name: Xposed Reloaded
description: Sin descripción

name: #1 Sudokus
description: The game to satiate your sudoku appetites!

name: Bus Driver Simulator: Countryside
description: Bus driving simulation game in which players must complete journeys around the city of Murom and its suburbs according to a schedule.

name: Our Summer Festival
description: This summer fair is bursting with activities! Grab a Joy-Con controller with up to 3 of your friends and join in the fun and games! Check out the festival-themed games like Takoyaki Cooking, Whac-a-Mole, and Mikoshi Racing! Try your hand at all the games in order as part of the Festival Master Championship, build up your own Coin Collection, and challenge yourself to get your best score yet! Pick your favorite of the 8 characters and enjoy a total of 10 exciting games!

name: Arcade Archives: Phozon
description: Phozon is an action game released by Namco in 1983. Control a nucleus called Chemic and merge with Molecules to complete specified formations. The formations get increasingly complex, but that only makes completing them more satisfying.

name: Figure Fantasy
description: The first 3D idle figurine mobile game, Figure Fantasy has arrived in style! Here, you'll become the figurines' master, and experience a wonderful adventure in their miniature world.

name: Unoklive vs. Zuck
description:
UnOk's twitch account was terminated!

UnOk will have to go to Twitch HQ and find out who is banning everyone.,

but not without some people in the way...

UnOkLive Vs Zuck is a 2D singleplayer bullet-hell game with tons of bosses and levels that shoots bullets. You are UnOk and you have to get to Twitch HQ to unban your twitch account.

name: Eos 27
description: Eos 27 is a 2D, strategic action-platformer in which you overtake your enemies through both careful planning and tight fighting. Carefully design an arena tailored to your enemy, then put it to the test in an epic, fast-paced fight for the sake of humankind.

name: Dead by Daylight: 5th Anniversary Edition
description:
Dead by Daylight is an asymmetrical multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where one player takes on the role of the savage Killer, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to escape the Killer and avoid being caught and killed.

The Dead by Daylight: 5th Anniversary Edition includes:

- The Last Breath Chapter
- A Lullaby for the Dark Chapter
- Of Flesh and Mud Chapter
- Spark of Madness Chapter

Additional Contents
- Biohazard Chapter
- Shattered Bloodline Chapter
- Curtain Call Chapter

name: Kuukiyomi 1 2 3+
description:
Minna de Kuki Yomi. The world, this is Japan. Enjoy this bundle with three of the Kuukiyomi games, and see how considerate you can be!

Kuukiyomi 1 2 3+ includes:
- Kuukiyomi: Consider It!
- Kuukiyomi 2: Consider It More! - New Era
- Kuukiyomi 3: Consider It More and More!! - Father to Son

name: Biohazard: 25th Episode Selection Vol. 1 - Fall of Umbrella
description:
Biohazard: 25th Episode Selection Vol. 1 - Fall of Umbrella is a physical bundle released as part of the series' 25th Anniversary campaign. It is essentially a box set of all the numbered titles. Each package version is included in the inner box, and the sleeve that covers the box is designed with an emblem that symbolizes each episode.

Resident Evil 25th Episode Selection Vol. 1 contains:
- Resident Evil (Biohazard) Origins Collection Best Price (includes Biohazard HD Remaster & Biohazard 0 HD Remaster)
- Resident Evil (Biohazard) RE:2 Z Version Best Price
- Resident Evil (Biohazard) RE:3 Z Version

name: Biohazard: 25th Episode Selection Vol. 3 - Episode of Ethan Winters
description:
Biohazard: 25th Episode Selection Vol. 3 - Episode of Ethan Winters is a physical bundle released as part of the series' 25th Anniversary campaign. It is essentially a box set of all the numbered titles. Each package version is included in the inner box, and the sleeve that covers the box is designed with an emblem that symbolizes each episode.

Resident Evil (Biohazard) 25th Episode Selection Vol. 3 contains:
- Resident Evil (Biohazard) 7 resident evil Gold Edition Grotesque Ver. Best Price
- Resident Evil (Biohazard) Village Z Version
- Product code for Biohazard RE:Verse
- Resident Evil (Biohazard) series postcard set

name: Biohazard: 25th Episode Selection Vol. 2 - Threat of Bioterrorism
description:
Biohazard: 25th Episode Selection Vol. 2 - Threat of Bioterrorism is a physical bundle released as part of the series' 25th Anniversary campaign. It is essentially a box set of all the numbered titles. Each package version is included in the inner box, and the sleeve that covers the box is designed with an emblem that symbolizes each episode.

Resident Evil (Biohazard) 25th Episode Selection Vol. 2 contains:
- Resident Evil (Biohazard) 4
- Resident Evil (Biohazard) 5
- Resident Evil (Biohazard) 6

name: Parfait Remake
description: Parfait Remake is a Bishoujo romance visual novel about two cafes competing for business. It is also a remake of Parfait: Chocolat Second Brew.

name: Cube Space
description: Cube Space is a minimalist arcade Shoot `em Up game set in space. You control a spaceship and your task is to score as many points as possible by destroying enemies and obstacles in your path.

name: Asatsugutori
description: Asatsugutori is an investigative adventure game that combines a visual novel with real-time 2D isometric exploration. It features a time loop feature that triggers when another character gets killed within the day. The player has an objective to gather as much information as possible by examining the rooms and talking with other characters.

name: Fuyu Kiss: Complete Limited Edition
description:
Fuyu Kiss is a romance visual novel. In the snowy landscape you give me a first kiss.

The Limited Edition of Fuyu Kiss includes:
- Fuyu Kiss
- B2 tapestry
- PR card

name: Parfait Remake: Complete Limited Edition
description:
Parfait Remake is a Bishoujo romance visual novel about two cafes competing for business. It is also a remake of Parfait: Chocolat Second Brew.

The Complete Limited Edition of Parfait Remake comes with:
- copy of Parfait Remake
- Especially drawn B2 tapestry
- Special visual booklet
- Lycee Overture PR Card

name: Fuyu Kiss
description: Fuyu Kiss is a romance visual novel. In the snowy landscape you give me a first kiss.

name: Asterix & Obelix: Slap Them All! - Collector's Edition
description:
Romans, pirates and boars beware! The famous Gauls Asterix and Obelix are coming back for a brand new adventure!

Unlike the magic potion, the gameplay recipe is pretty straight forward and holds no secrets. Think about the core mechanics defining the beat’em up genre and sprinkle with some local co-op! By Jupiter, by Teutates.. These Gauls are crazy!

Asterix & Obelix: Slap Them All! - Collector's Edition includes:
- Asterix & Obelix: Slap them All! with limited edition box
- Figurine (27 cm)
- A keychain
- Two sitckers sheets
- A content to be revealed soon

name: hexceed: Animo
description: Unlocks a new world for hexceed: Amino brings 122 new puzzles with a brand new mechanic to shake things up!

name: Fight Bots
description: FIGHT BOTS is a robot fighting game where you can customize your robot with a huge variety of parts and brawl against a bunch of unique enemies and bosses.

name: DoDonPachi Resurrection
description:
Once again the three pilots jump back in time to 2008 and enter the fray, the transport ship being targeted as soon as it exits the portal: the Element Daughters, gigantic evolutions of the Dolls, are awaiting...
The bee is still humming.

The legendary bullet-hell shoot-’em-up series from CAVE Co., Ltd., has now made its way to Nintendo Switch.

name: Pawapuro-kun Pocket R
description: The Power Pro Baseball spin-off series is back for the first time in 10 years! Power Pro Kun Pocket R is equipped with a completely different new training mode "Cyberval", a remake of "Success" which is the origin of the series, and a mini game. The dawn of a new baseball variety game!

name: 我有上将
description: Sin descripción

name: Idle Raid
description: 超休闲放置类刷副本游戏!！一个人就是一个公会团，不用肝，不氪金，随时随地打副本。

name: Battle Cats Quest
description: Knock your animal rivals off the edge and become the legendary King of Cats!

name: Luigi's Mansion: Premium Deluxe
description: An expansion to the original Luigi's Mansion for Nintendo Gamecube with a brand new revamped and redefined experience! Play Luigi's Mansion like never before and experience brand new features including things like toggling the blackout, removed on disc content, new overhauled graphics, quality of life features, and much much more!

name: Genshin Impact: Shadows Amidst Snowstorms
description:
Version 2.3 of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New characters: Arataki Itto and Gorou
• New story quests for Arataki Itto
• New main event: Shadows Amidst Snowstorms
• …and more!

name: Aaaaxy
description: A nonlinear 2D puzzle platformer taking place in impossible spaces.

name: Piyomori DX
description: Piyomori DX is an independent puzzle game released by GameBB, on SP in 2021.

name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Master Character Training Pack: Sasuke Uchiha
description:
A special training pack for your avatar!

Featured in this "Master Character Training Pack" is the one-and-only Sasuke Uchiha (Last Battle)!
Purchasing this DLC will make him available as a master at the Ninjutsu Library, ready to offer Ninjutsu training.

Train with Sasuke Uchiha (Last Battle) to acquire Training Points that can be used to unlock a variety of Ninjutsu, weapons, and costumes for your avatar!

name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time - Expansion Disk
description: A ROM hack/mod for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time which recreates the original design of its cancelled Expansion for the Nintendo 64DD, which was later cancelled and retooled as the Master Quest. It changes the dungeons, changing their layout and puzzles. It was based on the information found within the 2020 Gigaleak.

name: Eternal Tree
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Pilot
description: Star Pilot is all about Multiplayer Space Combat. You start with a Fighter and a Personal Space Station plus enough credits and items to fight in 3 different Arenas with 3 Modes. Star Pilot is Free; Win XPs and extra credits and unlock new Ships, Ranks and Ammos.

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Faces of War
description: New crusaders arrive in Kenabres to fight the demons and free Golarion from the Worldwound.

name: Middle Ages Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Middle Ages Jigsaw Puzzles - Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Middle Ages Jigsaw Puzzles is designed for adults.

name: Robin Hood: Spring of Life
description: As you overcome obstacles, gather resources and rebuild ravaged villages, you'll turn the pages of a fun and adventurous story packed with twists, turns and laughter!

name: Cat Clicker
description: The Ultimate Cat Clicking Experience

name: Drone VR
description: Do you love drones or are you thinking about buying one? Thanks to Drone VR, you will have the opportunity to fly drones in virtual reality - without the fear of smashing this expensive device. My task was to create an application for flying drones and release it at an affordable, low price.

name: Let's Puzzle
description: Let's Puzzle is a collection of beautiful pictures from yourself and from others. You can sit at home, relax and solve fun puzzles. Get rid of the tiredness of the whole day and plunge into the wonderful puzzle world.

name: Life in the Machine
description: A detective game, which involves investigating a crime scene.

name: Obama Boss Fight
description: In the world where all answers were told the great enemies confronted each other. The time has come. Time to defeat Obama once and for all. Will the world be free from racism or you will start a new era? It is up to you. But keep in mind... Obama has no chill.

name: Sunset World Online
description: Sunset World Online is a 2D side-scroller MMORPG with four unique elements to choose from; wind, water, earth, and fire! Each element has its' role, bringing unique experiences in Expeditions. Gather your party and embark on a journey to Edge World!

name: Fishing: North Atlantic - Enhanced Edition
description: Commercial fishing in North Atlantic! Discover majestic world of Canadian Nova Scotia while admiring the vast diversity of ocean life. Search for the ocean gold with upgradable fishing boats and various fishing gear as you progress in your fisherman career.

name: Cryght
description: A jump action game to find crystals.

name: Aliens Strike
description: Aliens Strike is the heir to the arcade classics, all captured with great graphics. This action-packed game will keep you tied to the couch, since it has all the elements that make a good shmup: huge lasers, big explosions and terrifying bosses. Aliens Strike is not a shmup like the others. The scenery and great effects will take your breath away. The gameplay, progression system and collectibles will keep you on your toes. You'll want more! Fortunately, you have hours of intense fun ahead of you....

name: DNAxCat
description: In the virtual adventure world of DNAxCat, players can raise and breed a variety of cute meow warriors and fight side by side with them. And players can get more rewards through daily missions, PVE, and PVP systems in the game. At the same time, DNAxCat is also an economy in which ownership is totally decided by players, allowing players to seamlessly sell and trade their game assets into Token. DNAxCat wants to lead the trend of GameFi and “Play To Earn”, allowing players to earn by playing games.

name: Kirakira Monstars
description: It's sure to bring a smile to everyone's face! In the big city of the human world, a group of monstrous girls go about their daily lives in a serious, anything-goes, slapstick frenzy!

name: Lucent Bounds
description: Lucent Bounds is a short and challenging 3D platformer. Make your way through an alien ocean planet by jumping, dashing, slamming, gliding, and swinging about. Avoid hazards, collect treasures, and challenge yourself in speed runs.

name: Trachi: Autonomy
description:
A story-driven adventure about a city and three people that shouldn't be there.
Retrace the events of a tragedy through a disjointed narrative. See whether you can make out the true intentions of a people that so desperately try to hide their true intentions.

name: Archie
description: Help Archie find the way out of the cave by solving an addicting puzzle.

name: My First Furry
description: Short puzzle game with beautiful furry girls. Relaxing music and cozy yet spicy atmosphere. Awesome for relax after a day at work.

name: Cliffhanger: Challenger of Tomorrow
description: Punch out Fascists and unravel conspiracies in this explosive pulp adventure set in a wild 1930s world of airships, fast cars and two-fisted action!

name: Not Alone
description:
You say you're not alone as you walk with no thought nor direction. You say you're not scared as you see beautiful sceneries. You say you're not hurt but you feel empty.

Who's to say what is real and what is not...

Either way, you're "not alone" you say as you keep on walking.

name: King under the Mountain
description: A simulation-based settlement-building strategy game set in a fantasy world - build and grow from a humble colony to control of your own kingdom!

name: Eve Online: New Dawn
description:
This update includes:
- Added AEGIS Secure Transfer Facility, AEGIS Secure Capital Construction Forge, AEGIS Capital Ship Security Facility, and Overmind Nursery Groves sites
- ESS activation causing Capsuleer Combat Timer replaced with Weapons Timer instead
- Drag and Drop ship fittings to skill plan
- Increased Rogue Drone NPC buy orders
- Corporation Recruitment changes

name: Snake
description: Sin descripción

name: My Cute, Pure Boyfriend
description:
In this interactive story choice game, the one in control of the romantic story is you!
You have multiple option as to how the story will go.
Become immersed in an enchanted game of your choice.

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - Detective Pack
description:
This DLC includes the following items:

Master Sleuth Outfit
The Greatest Detective Outfit
Ukrainian Jon Outfit

name: Tamagotchi Smart
description:
The Tamagotchi Smart is a virtual pet released in November 2021, celebrating the Tamagotchi franchise's 25th anniversary. Unlike previous Tamagotchi releases, it is in the style of a wearable smartwatch, akin to the Apple Watch and various other devices.
The Tamagotchi Smart uses TamaSma Card, also known as Tama Smart Card, which is a memory card that can be inserted into the Tamagotchi Smart to download additional characters, items, accessories, games, wallpapers, clock faces, and food.

name: Necromunda: Hired Gun - Gang Wars Cosmetics Bundle
description: Pick a side or die alone, there’s no in between. Get the Gang Wars Cosmetics Bundle to receive all three Gang Wars skin set DLCs and embody an Escher, Goliath, or Nautican with exclusive skins for your outfit, knife, mastiff and chew toy.

name: Satisfactory: Update 5
description: Sin descripción

name: Horizon Chase Turbo: Ayrton Senna Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Twogether: Project Indigos Chapter 1
description:
Twogether: Project Indigos is a single player third person puzzle adventure. Set in the frightening Hexacells facilities, Twogether will pose original puzzles that will only be solvable by collaboration.

The game will make the players examine, evaluate and act according to the elements in their surroundings and the powers of the two protagonists, as if they were to escape from a gloomy Escape Room.

name: Disney Classic Games: Aladdin and The Lion King - The Jungle Book and More Aladdin Pack
description: A DLC which upgrades the original game by adding the content added to the Disney Classic Games Collection compilation. It includes the SNES version of Aladdin as well as different iterations of Disney's The Jungles Book.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Absolute
description: A mod for the Sonic the Hedgehog 1/2 2013 Decompilation which has included bug fixes, extra options and abilities that are new to even the mobile ports. Arcade Mode has been added to the game modes menu. Ring Chain has been implemented and Knuckles and Tails are now available to play as a pair.

name: Jump Jerboa
description:
What are jerboas? Why, they're desert rodents that can REALLY jump!
Trapped in a cage for much of your life, it's time to bust out and face adversity in Jump Jerboa, an unforgiving, minimalist one-button micro platformer! You will fail over and over, but in the end the freedom will be well worth the pain... right?
Jump Jerboa is packed with challenging micro-levels. Play as a jerboa who must escape a facility filled with countless death traps.

name: Deeeer Simulator: The Final Evolution of Deeeer
description: This is DLC for players who just couldn't get enough average, everyday DEEEER with the main game. Everyone's favorite DEEEER is about to achieve his final evolutionary form.

name: Onna no Ko Keeper 3
description: This game is a real-time action game with a retro atmosphere. Enjoy the more challenging stages and the CG of "ONNANOKO".

name: Deranged
description: Deranged is a single player puzzle and psychological horror video game. Find a way to escape the O'Connor mansion before things get tough. Remember that in order to escape you must complete challenging puzzles against the clock ... Will you be able?

name: Spell Sweeper
description: Spell Sweeper is a puzzle game which based on "Minesweeper". Fight against enemy by Opening/placing flags to squares.

name: Pregnant
description: In this first-person horror experience you will solve puzzles while navigating the pitch black Reed forest. Armed with only your flashlight you are at the mercy of the forests inhabitants, with limited time to find your way before they find you and end your adventure.

name: Clocknockers
description: Bad Dudes have broken Time Itself, You must travel to multiple Times and Locations to fix time.

name: Tekken 7: Definitive Edition
description: Purchase Tekken 7: Definitive Edition and get the most complete experience for Tekken 7! This edition includes the full game, Eliza DLC, and all additional content in all 4 Season Passes.

name: Myths or Reality: Fairy Lands - Collector's Edition
description: The further into the forest the more fantastic things you will see. Do not be afraid of what you do not know or understand. Remember the oldest legends about fairies that live deeply in a forest. Be bold enough to face something unusual in a classical English village!

name: Let's Sing 2022: Platinum Edition
description: Grab your microphone for the best singing game experience with Let’s Sing 2022 Platinum Edition! This includes a copy of the Let’s Sing 2022 game and the Let’s Sing 2022 Song Pass which allows you to sing all of the DLC Content!

name: Flannel Amethyst
description: Join Franka in Flannel Amethyst: a 3D platformer featuring ten different levels. Double jump and airdash your way through various levels and use your burst to reach greater heights!

name: Hearts of Iron IV: No Step Back
description:
The bitter fighting of the Eastern Front is given new depth and variety in No Step Back, the expansion to Hearts of Iron IV. With new alternate history paths and game systems, this eagerly awaited add-on presents new challenges for fans of Paradox Interactive’s best-selling grand strategy wargame.

The centerpiece of No Step Back is a series of new National Focus Trees, giving players many new ways to imagine the course of World War II in Eastern Europe. Major nations have been entirely reworked to offer unique challenges and original histories.

name: Let's Sing 2022: French Version
description: Let’s Sing is back and this time on the new generation! Grab a microphone, some friends, and join the hottest karaoke game of the year!

name: Mido and Di
description: Mido is an alien kid having nightmares about zombie aliens. One night he draws a creature, Di, and it comes alive to teach Mido how to fight zombies.

name: Awaken: Chaos Era
description: Enter the mythical world of Awaken, an ancient land held together only by the elements that brought it into existence. Peace is now being torn apart as the former King has disturbed the balance and brought the continent to the brink of destruction. As the constant struggle between light and darkness wages on, It's time to join the battle and awaken your inner hero!

name: Alpine: The Simulation Game
description: Welcome to the beautiful world of mountains! In Alpine - The Simulation Game you can expect a varied story mode with many missions, and all this in the middle of a lovingly designed game world in the snowy Alps.

name: Jigsaw Tour
description: Travel all over the world with Jigsaw Tour! Start your unforgettable tour!

name: Mango
description: Mango is a surrealist first-person adventure/puzzle game about art and derealization, featuring trippy, psychedelic visuals, intense psychological and philosophical undertones, fragmented storytelling and experimental horror elements.

name: Tunnel of Doom
description: Tunnel of Doom is an action rogue-lite hybrid that mixes tower defense with melee and ranged combat gameplay. Randomly generated, every run is different as you guide Angel on a quest to rescue her husband. Gather resources, discover perks, and use what you find to battle waves of monsters.

name: Infinite Monkeys
description: The goal of the game is to write the entire first scene of the first act of Shakespeare's King Lear, one random letter at a time. Monkeys will type letters at random until one hits the correct one, and each completed letter gets you $1. Use the buttons on the top floor to hire more monkeys and motivate the existing ones to work faster by buying posters and banana trees.

name: VS. Kapi: Arcade Showdown
description: Sin descripción

name: Rustling Leaves
description: A digital implementation of the 2020 roll-and-write board game designed by Paolo Mori.

name: Your_New_Life_Letter.rtf.exe
description: A story of uncovering family secrets, filtered through the world of Tony Domenico's Petscop.

name: Dead Cells: Everyone is Here!
description: Crossover content with Hyper Light Drifter, Curse of the Dead Gods, Guacamelee, Skul, Blasphemous, and Hollow Knight.

name: Tekken 7: Originals Edition
description: This versions contains the full game with the 12 Tekken series original character packs, as well as the new frame data feature.

name: Stellaris: Aquatics Species Pack
description: Embrace the life of a seafaring civilization as you sail the open expanses of the galaxy with Stellaris' most immersive pack yet: the Aquatics Species Pack! Let a wave of new customizable options for your empire crash into Stellaris, with a treasure trove of new species portraits, ship set, origins and more.

name: Let's Sing 2022: Chinese Version
description: Let’s Sing is back and this time on the new generation! Grab a microphone, some friends, and join the hottest karaoke game of the year!

name: God as a Fat Woman Sitting in the Bath
description: A poem made for the bipsi creation myth jam.

name: Farming Simulator 22: Claas Xerion Saddle Trac Pack
description:
Claas Xerion Saddle Trac Pack includes:
- Claas Xerion 4200 Saddle Trac
- Kaweco Xerion Saddle Trac Tanker
- Kaweco Xerion Saddle Trac Semi-Trailed Tanker
- Kaweco Xerion Opti-Ject 800
- Kaweco Xerion Front-Unit

name: Farming Simulator 22: Mack Trucks - Black Anthem
description: With the Mack Black Anthem for Farming Simulator 22, you haul in style and all in black: The iconic American truck by Mack Trucks is bursting with strength and style, built for your extended farming operation. Enjoy the authentically digitized design of the Black Anthem, and get your produce on the road!

name: Farming Simulator 22: Fendt 900 Black Beauty
description: Strong, black, and beautiful: Get the Fendt 900 Vario Black Beauty for Farming Simulator 22, and award your farm with some dark elegance when you roam the roads and fields. With up to 415 units of horsepower for the top configuration, and the striking design of the Fendt Vario series, you’ll be ready for more - whatever your farming operation requires.

name: Farming Simulator 22: Antonio Carraro Pack
description: Expand your flourishing business of beautiful vineyards and lush olive orchards with compact, but powerful and versatile tractors by historic Italian manufacturer Antonio Carraro. They allow you to operate extremely maneuverable in special conditions, where other tractors can’t handle the terrain with steep gradients and narrow spaces.

name: Farming Simulator 22: Year 1 Season Pass
description:
Includes:
- Zetor 25 K
- Antonio Carraro Pack
- Pack 2: Kubota Pack
- Pack 3: Vermeer Pack
- First expansion: Platinum Expansion

name: Farming Simulator 22: Zetor 25 K
description: Start the motor and enjoy the sound of some European agricultural tradition: With the Zetor Z-25 K, you till your fields with a four-stroke, twin-cylinder diesel engine from another era. Built by the Czech manufacturer Zetor between the early 1950s and late 1960s, the authentic rebuild tractor for Farming Simulator 22 adds a unique and old-school charm to your farm.

name: Akane Chan-bara
description: A short side-scrolling sword-fighting action film in which Akane-chan does her best.

name: SMW Remade from Memory
description: We challenged ourselves to reconstruct all the levels, maps, and songs in Super Mario World (1994) based purely on what we could remember. The result is thoroughly unsettling. Please enjoy this testament to the fallibility of human memory.

name: Venova Adventure
description: Venova Adventure is a Pokémon fangame set in Venezuela. Based on its cities, legends and culture.

name: Airball
description: In this classic isometric action game, you have been transformed into a fragile ball of air by an evil wizard. Can you make your way through over 250 fiendish rooms to find the means to turn yourself back into a human?

name: Hot Hentai Puzzle Vol.2
description: Relaxing puzzle with beautiful women that will keep you in a good mood.

name: The Missing Link
description: The Missing Link is a pixel art-style RPG game with turn-based strategy. Available in portuguese and english. The game features: 90 collectable cards for the mini-game, +400 spells, legendary weapons and demonic relics forging system, resource collection system, 9 playable characters.

name: Scrapvival
description: Fight off robot hordes with help of your friends or alone as soon as possible build the helicopter and escape that damned and creepy junkyard!

name: Dual Fury
